abstracts.cdata!:
The Inspection Panel Report on the
            Request for Inspection summarizes the allegations of the
            Requesters that Bank has not followed its own policies and
            procedures in respect to the Arun III Hydroelectric Project
            in Nepal. The Inspection Panel has reviewed the Request for
            Inspection and the Management Response that followed. The
            Panel's findings are based on the information contained
            in the text and referenced documents noted in the Request
            and Management Response.  The Inspection Panel is satisfied
            that the conditions required for this project have been met.
            The Panel makes additional comments to the statements given
            by the Requesters and the responses given in the Management
            Response. Annex D is the Management Response. Annex C is the
            Request for Inspection.
